title: # 542 - The Confused Breakfast & ME
itunes:title: # 542 - The Confused Breakfast & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with the guys from The Confused Breakfast podcast, Mike Schulte, AJ Vens, and Sean Prior. We talk about all things movies, our favorite movies, movie conspiracy theories, our favorite actors/actresses, iconic movies, movies with the biggest box office payday, and much more! 

 

Follow The Confused Breakfast

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@confusedbreakfast  

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/ConfusedBreakfast 

Apple: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-confused-breakfast/id1533985693 

 

This episode is brought to you by Shopify. Get a free 14 day trial at http://www.shopify.com/bertcast 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Goodr. Go to http://www.goodr.com/bert to get free shipping.

 

This episode is brought to you by Ladder. Go to http://www.ladderlife.com/bert to find out if you’re approved today!

 

This episode is also brought to you by Mizzen+Main. Go to http://www.mizzenandmain.com to receive $25 off any regular price order of $130 or more with the code “BERTCAST”

 

This episode is brought to you by Whoop Go to http://www.whoop.com and enter code BERT to save 10% off. To join the 2 Bears, 0 Drinks Team: https://app.whoop.com/mobile-redir?code=COMM-2BEARS (Mobile only)

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
